# Tennis

Tennis is currently supported for the following leagues (in alphabetical order):

```{toctree}
:maxdepth: 1

league-tennis-atp
league-tennis-ita
league-tennis-itf
league-tennis-ncaa
league-tennis-usta
league-tennis-wta
```

```{eval-rst}
.. automodule:: sportypy.surfaces.tennis
    :members: TennisCourt
```
